name: Magical Harvest
storyline: Crossbreed magical animals, evolve crops, build relationships based on choices and find love without limitations. Play as one out of 5 species and shape your own enchanted farm paradise, while mastering rune carving and magic potions brewing, and restore the magic in a damaged fantasy world.
summary: In this 3D-fantasy farming game you are the one who wants to save the world of Hyldena from the loss of all magic. While exploring Hyldena, you will be able to evolve plants and animals into magical variations and even learn how to use magic yourself with alchemy.
